org.apache.distributedlog.client.routing

Interface RoutingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsistentHashRoutingService, RegionsRoutingService, SingleHostRoutingService

    public interface RoutingService
    Routing Service provides mechanism how to route requests.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  RoutingService.Builder
      Builder to build routing service.
      static class  RoutingService.RoutingContext
      Routing Context of a request.
      static interface  RoutingService.RoutingListener
      Listener for server changes on routing service.

      Register routing listener.
